name: fenos/notifynder
description: Management system of internal notifications for Laravel 5.*

suggest.astrotomic/notifynder-sender-email: Allows to send notifications as email.
suggest.astrotomic/notifynder-sender-redis: Allows to send notifications via Redis (Pub/Sub).
suggest.astrotomic/notifynder-sender-slack: Allows to send notifications via Slack.
suggest.astrotomic/notifynder-sender-messagebird: Allows to send notifications via MessageBird.
suggest.astrotomic/notifynder-sender-nexmo: Allows to send notifications via Nexmo.
suggest.astrotomic/notifynder-sender-twilio: Allows to send notifications via Twilio.
